body_html:
result of git bisect:

commit 9cb8b437786648dfcf1e6a60dced70b6ee983311
Author: Sam Gross <colesbury@gmail.com>
Date:   Tue Nov 14 12:59:06 2017 -0500

    Split off in-place NN functions (#3683)
    
    For example, this splits threshold into threshold(), which is now
    never in-place, and threshold_() which is always in-place.
    
    This simplifies the in-place vs. non-in-place logic in
    gen_variable_type.py, which was bug-prone.

:040000 040000 41e00599aec0edd4ca83831b70b5bea6548f93e2 5dcb50f14bd811935e98e2286a1046944a80c015 M	aten
:040000 040000 7fe0482203d52e0739324180a4d7e2ea84be9e42 7b53a7090d7d0e567ec507ff45f544f260971482 M	docs
:040000 040000 1cce0769b77847d40e644bc69d34d690e05c411c de0d3f1b2fb41e3e9f7a0896e8f19038ff55b3a6 M	tools
:040000 040000 c7fc37d284a99153972a910558fbd95902fcb5bf 65483bdccdeb25bb9cac709ba5adaa8b4759e8d2 M	torch

@colesbury ^^ any ideas?
